definition: to start an engine/to boot up (a computer)/to press Ctrl-Alt-Delete/to begin shooting a film or TV show

to open/to start/to turn on/to boil/to write out (a prescription, check, invoice etc)/to operate (a vehicle)/carat (gold)/abbr. for Kelvin, 開爾文|开尔文[Kai1 er3 wen2]/abbr. for 開本|开本[kai1 ben3], book format

sentences.english: A PSU (Power Supply Unit) fan is always running when the computer it powers is on.
sentences.chinese: 只要開機，電源風扇就會一直在轉。

sentences.english: Any overshoot at turn on or turn off shall be less than 10% of rated output voltage.
sentences.chinese: 開機或關機時，電壓過沖不得超過標稱值的10%。

sentences.english: I logged on at 7 o'clock and logged off at 12 o'clock.
Others displayed a specific message once the computer was turned on.
sentences.chinese: 其它的則在電腦一開機就顯示特定的信息。

sentences.english: To resolve the issue, try to reseat the power adapter.
sentences.chinese: 開機就出現這樣的問題。

sentences.english: As long as the vice director speaked "open", I run to the film.
sentences.chinese: 只要是副導演一聲開機，朝着鏡頭狂奔就行。

sentences.english: Members boot any doubts as to not miss the target and immediately issued instructions to open packages.
sentences.chinese: 開機員以不放過任何疑點爲目標，立即下達開包指令。

sentences.english: We'll see what happens after the boot.
sentences.chinese: 我們會看到在開機後會發生什麼。

sentences.english: Before turn on the instrument, please use the discharging rod to discharge the tested object fully.
sentences.chinese: 開機前應用放電棒對試品進行充分放電。

sentences.english: Computer boots off automatically, their get it working, and.
sentences.chinese: 電腦開機自動斷電，自己搞不定了。

sentences.english: I was stuck with booting into PC-BSD for a little while.
sentences.chinese: 我是堅持開機到電腦的BSD的一小會兒。

sentences.english: Filming on Death Comes to Pemberley is due to begin in Britain in the summer.
sentences.chinese: 《死亡來到彭伯利》將於今年夏天在英國開機。

sentences.english: Light-touch switch to start the machine with only one press.
sentences.chinese: 輕觸開關控制一鍵自動開機。

sentences.english: What information can be learned during the initial router bootup?
sentences.chinese: 當路由器開機初始化時，可以得到什麼資訊呢？

sentences.english: You can turn the button on.
sentences.chinese: 你可以摁一下開機的按鈕。

definition: to begin shooting (a movie, a scene of a movie etc)/to start the bidding (auction)/to start a trading session (stock market)
cast and crew/performers and production team
time of day exactly on the hour (i.e. 12:00, 1:00 etc)/to make an inventory/(math.) point that has integer coordinates
newsletter/the news in brief/(Tw) SMS message
to make a wish/to make a vow/to promise a reward
to open a door (lit. and fig.)/to open for business
